title: Clean Energy and Network Efficiency Improvement Project - Package 04 - Medium Voltage / Distribution Sub. Projects, Lot A
decision_details:
- this project includes the following: 

*	33kV Double Circuit (DC) Tower Line from Vavuniya Grid Substation (GSS) to the proposed Kebithigollawa Gantry (23 km) and related works; and 

* 	33kV DC Tower Line from New Anuradhapura GSS to the proposed Kahatagasdigiliya Gantry (31 km) and related works.

	The  proposal made by Hon. (Mrs.) Pavithra Wanniarachchi, Minister of Power and Energy, to award the above contract to the lowest evaluated substantially responsive bidder as recommended by the Standing Cabinet Appointed Procurement Committee (SCAPC), was approved by the Cabinet.
